import { useSelector } from "react-redux/es/exports"; export default function Cart(){ const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); return(

Your Shopping Bag

{ cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? (

Your Cart is currently Empty

Start Shopping
) : ( <>
{cart.cartItems?.map(cartItem => (

{cartItem.title}

Quantity: {cartItem.cartQuantity} Price: ${cartItem.price * cartItem.cartQuantity}
))}

Pricing Summary

Subtotal: ${cart.cartTotalAmount} Coupon: ${cart.cartTotalAmount} Gift Card: ${cart.cartTotalAmount} Estimated Tax: ${cart.cartTotalAmount} Estimated Shipping: ${cart.cartTotalAmount} Estimated Total: ${cart.cartTotalAmount}
)}
); }
